ClientSide.client

Class ClientConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientSide.client.ClientConfiguration

  • public class ClientConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    ClientConfiguration: POJO to client application configuration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CONFIGURATION_PATH
      The path of the configuration XML resource, relative to current class path.

      Default connection port.

      The name of 'Port' property.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ClientConfiguration getInstance()
      If it is the first call to the method, the method will try read configuration from XML file (if the reading failed, will be created default configuration), try first to load XML file from execution folder and then from resources.

      int getPort()

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ClientConfiguration getInstance()
        If it is the first call to the method, the method will try read configuration from XML file (if the reading failed, will be created default configuration), try first to load XML file from execution folder and then from resources. Else the method will return an existing configuration.
        Returns:
        The application configuration.

      • getIp

        public java.lang.String getIp()
        Returns:
        the connectivity IP.

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        Returns:
        the connectivity port.

      • isDefaultConfiguration

        public boolean isDefaultConfiguration()
        Identifies whether or not the configuration is default.
        Returns:
        true if the loaded default configuration, false if does not.

      • setIp

        public void setIp(java.lang.String ip)
        Parameters:
        ip - the connectivity IP.

      • setPort

        public void setPort(int port)
        Parameters:
        port - the connectivity port.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • updateResourceFile

        public boolean updateResourceFile()
        If exist XML configuration file in execution folder the Method will update it, if does not will create one.
        Returns:
        true if the updating succeed and false if updating failed.
